city.goal: Seek out and execute anyone who poses a threat to the City.

citizen.name: Citizen
citizen.abilities: - You may hide with a target at night.
citizen.artifacts:
- If your target is attacked during the night, you will see their killer!
- If your target is attacked by a Serial Killer, you will also die.

detective.name: Detective
detective.abilities:
- You may investigate an alive player to get a clue of their role.
- You may investigate a dead player to see their role and cause of death.

interrogator.name: Interrogator
interrogator.abilities:
- You may choose an interrogation target during the day.
- At night, you will be able to anonymously speak to your target.
interrogator.artifacts: - If your target is a Spy, they will not be able to see the private Spy chat.

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.abilities:
- You may mark a target for death during the night.
- Your marked target will die the following night.
hunter.artifacts: - If you change your target on the night your marked target will die, the delay will reset.

doctor.name: Doctor
doctor.abilities: - You may heal someone so they do not die that night.
doctor.artifacts: - If your target is attacked more than once, they will die despite your heal.

merchant.name: Merchant
merchant.abilities:
- You may sell a player protection or information during the night.
- Protection will last until your target is attacked, and it will delay their death by one night.
- Information allows your target to use the role of a dead player, no matter their faction.
merchant.artifacts: - Each ability has a two night cooldown before it may be used again.

spies.goal: Eliminate all who oppose the Spies.

hitman.name: Hitman
hitman.abilities: - You may choose to kill someone at night.
hitman.artifacts: - Saboteur visits will not block your kill.

agent.name: Agent
agent.abilities: - You may investigate someone to see their true role during the night.

saboteur.name: Saboteur
saboteur.abilities: - You may block all visits on a target for one night.
saboteur.artifacts: - Your ability will not affect other Spy roles.

framer.name: Framer
framer.abilities: - You may frame someone, causing them to appear as a Framer.
framer.artifacts: - Your frames will last until the game ends.

outcast.name: Outcast
outcast.abilities: - Once you get lynched, you may kill one player after death.
outcast.artifacts: - This kill cannot be prevented, and will appear as "shot by a gun."

serial killer.name: Serial Killer
serial killer.goal: Kill at least three other players, or be the last one standing.
serial killer.abilities: - You may kill someone each night.
serial killer.artifacts: - If a Citizen is visiting your target, you will also kill them.

psychopath.name: Psychopath
psychopath.goal: Remain alive to the end of the game.
psychopath.abilities: - You may manipulate your target into visiting another target.
psychopath.artifacts:
- You will not see their role.
- They will not know they have been manipulated.
